meanings.meaning: leave somebody to their own devices

vlive.korean: 이거 어떻게 놔둬야 되냐? - 이렇게 놔두면 되지 않을까? - 근데 이게 너무... Can I just leave it like this? - I think so. - But it's too... 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: Can I just leave it like this? - I think so. - But it's too...

vlive.korean: 디노 좀 오래 놔두면 안 돼요? Can we leave DINO for a while? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.16 MBTI of SVT #3
vlive.english: Can we leave DINO for a while?

vlive.korean: 그렇죠 - 탄산수도 그냥 놔두면 물로 변하지 않을까요? That's right. - If we leave it for awhile, wouldn't it be water? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대 #63
vlive.english: That's right. - If we leave it for awhile, wouldn't it be water?

vlive.korean: 꿍꼬드님께서 '밤까지 놔두면 머털도사 가능한가요?' "Fan ID" said, "If you leave it until nighttime, can you become like Taoist Meoteol?" 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 강원 산불돕기 행사를 마치고^^
vlive.english: "Fan ID" said, "If you leave it until nighttime, can you become like Taoist Meoteol?"

vlive.korean: 그러니까... - 이거 놔두면... So... - If you had just left them... 듣기 View video GOT7 : [ GOT7NOW ] 겸나잇🌼
vlive.english: So... - If you had just left them...

examples.korean: If the woodland is left alone, it will regenerate itself in a few years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 삼림지대는 가만히 놔두면 수년 뒤에 스스로 재생이 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If the woodland is left alone, it will regenerate itself in a few years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This cannot be allowed to go on. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이런 상황이 계속되도록 놔두면 안 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This cannot be allowed to go on. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’d eat chocolate all day long if I let him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 내가 놔두면 하루 종일 초콜릿을 먹을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’d eat chocolate all day long if I let him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Letting your customers set your standards is a dangerous game, because the race to the bottom is pretty easy to win. Setting your own standards--and living up to them--is a better way to profit. Not to mention a better way to make your day worth all the effort you put into it. (Seth Godin) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 고객이 당신의 기준을 정하게 놔두면 위험한 이유는, 하향 출혈 경쟁이 당연한 수순이기 때문이다. 자신의 기준을 스스로 정하고 이를 지켜나가는 게 더 나은 수익 창출 방법이다. 또한, 하루 동안 쏟은 노력의 가치를 인정받는 더 나은 방법임은 말할 나위도 없다. (세스 고딘, 일명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Letting your customers set your standards is a dangerous game, because the race to the bottom is pretty easy to win. Setting your own standards--and living up to them--is a better way to profit. Not to mention a better way to make your day worth all the effort you put into it. (Seth Godin) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They find candidates who would not ordinarily apply. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그냥 놔두면 지원을 하지 않을 지원자를 찾아낸다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They find candidates who would not ordinarily apply. Add to Wordbook
